text: Va hangome ki ʙa onon [kofiron] gufta savad: "Az on ci Alloh taolo nozil kardaast, pajravi kuned", megujand: [Na] Balki mo az cize pajravi mekunem, ki padaroni xudro ʙar on joftaem. Ojo agar padaronason [az haqiqat] cize nafahmidavu hidojat najofta ʙosand [ʙoz ham kur – kurona az onon pajravi mekunand]
